name: JakAl Hardjak Suit Prototype
description:
Stretchy enough to survive transformations, provides an interface for a sylph suit to be worn underneath and control the Hardjak's size

during downtime you may take a downtime action to continue work on the prototype
0-5 upgrade to mk 1
6-10 upgrade to mk 2
11-15 upgrade to mk 3
16-20+ upgrade to mk 4

name: JakAl Hardjak Suit Mk1
description:
Stretchy enough to survive transformations, provides an interface for a sylph suit to be worn underneath and control the Hardjak's size

during downtime you may take a downtime action to continue work on the suit
0-6 upgrade to mk 2

name: JakAl Hardjak Armoured Suit Mk3
description:
Stretchy enough to survive transformations, provides an interface for a sylph suit to be worn underneath and control the Hardjak's size.
folding and deployable ballistic plating grant a measure of protection compared to previous models
Modular design allows for the integration of pilot equipment
Camo Cloth integration allows it to have the same function
The integration of ballistic plating allows higher survivability, at the expense of some agility

when transformed its profile changes to the following:
HP: 3 E-Defense: 8 Evasion: 7 Speed: 4 Armor: 1

Can only be taken if the appropriate downtime action was taken
during downtime you may take a downtime action to continue work on the suit, upgrading it to the mk 4

name: JakAl Hardjak Mk 4 Armour
description:
Stretchy enough to survive transformations, provides an interface for a sylph suit to be worn underneath and control the Hardjak's size.
folding and deployable ballistic plating grant a measure of protection compared to previous models
Modular design allows for the integration of pilot equipment
Camo Cloth integration allows it to have the same function
The integration of ballistic plating allows higher survivability, at the expense of some agility
The Mk 4 integrates a combat stimm injector to its design

when transformed its profile changes to the following:
HP: 3 E-Defense: 8 Evasion: 7 Speed: 4 Armor: 1

Can only be taken if the appropriate downtime action was taken

actions.name: Activate Injector
actions.detail:
Expend a charge for one of the following effects:

  • Kick: Keeps a pilot awake and alert for up to 30 hours.

  • Freeze: Keeps a pilot calm and emotionally stable; deadens fear and other strong reactions.

  • Juice: Heighten senses and alertness, reduce fatigue, and shorten reaction times. Juice occasionally provokes rage in some users.
